channel.title: Arena Shadow
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Arena Shadow" - Anyone fight theirs yet?

item.title: Re: Arena Shadow
item.content:encoded: i beat my shadow without knowing i did. i wasn't paying attention to the opponents (i never do) and was surprised when the game told me i'd just won the destiny warrior item. i actually had to look here to find out how i'd won it.

item.title: Re: Arena Shadow
item.content:encoded: Well this is a bit annoying. Lilly has fought her Shadow three times now but my other two haven't seen a thing. I wonder if the Helix Tattoo helps the odds (beyond the extra fights).

item.title: Re: Arena Shadow
item.content:encoded: No, the list would be HUGE and would take a very long time to document the number of people in every rank and season.

item.title: Re: Arena Shadow
item.content:encoded: you are more likely to face people in the same rank and season than in another season. is it possible to see the total number of players in each rank/season

item.title: Re: Arena Shadow
item.content:encoded: Well I don't know about that, today in arena i attacked a season 1 Genin and season 3 Sannin and I'm just season 2 Jonin

item.title: Re: Arena Shadow
item.content:encoded:
It doesn't appear to have been. (No moon stats are shown.)

If you're wondering whether it has to be dark hour to fight your shadow, then no, it doesn't. I fought mine outside of the dark hour.

If you want to increase your chance of fighting your shadow, then the best way is to get to Season 5 or 6. There aren't a lot of players that high, so there's a smaller pool of players you can face, and your chances of fighting the shadow go up. I hear that players around Seasons 10-12 fight their shadow almost every time.
